Sent: Thursday, 28 August 2025 10:17 AM
To: Rose Corpuz <Rose.Corpuz@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Munazza Javid Ahmed Kazi (DOM) <munazza.kazi@dubaioutletmall.com>; Rosielynn Espina (DOM) <retailadmin@dubaioutletmall.com>; Megha Sagar (DOM) <retaildesk@dubaioutletmall.com>; Jimshiya Asariparambil (DOM) <retailaccounts@dubaioutletmall.com>
Subject: RE: Chalhoub - Renewed Insurance 2025

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Ms. Rose, 

 

Trust this mail finds you well. 

 

Please be informed that the Property All Risk and Third Party Liability insurance for the following outlet are set to expire on 23rd September 2025. Kindly share the renewed Certificate on or before the expiry date.

Please be informed that the Property All Risk and Third Party Liability insurance for the following outlet are set to expire on 23rd September 2025. Kindly share the renewed Certificate on or before the expiry date. 

 

*	Guess Outlet (Unit G114)
*	The Deal Outlet (Unit G79/G81/G81A/G85/G88)
*	The Shoes Deal Outlet (Unit G75B)

 

See below required clauses for your reference:

 

*	Property All Risks Fire & Allied Perils 

-Include the cover of “Business Interruption or Loss of Rent”

-Waiver of subrogation clause to be included against Dubai Outlet Mall/Landlord under both the property & business interruption section.

                                                                                                                                                  

*	Third Party Liability 

-Limit of indemnity AED 10M                                                             

-Dubai Outlet Mall to be included as additional/joint insured.

-Cross liability clause to be included 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Jaigen Suegay

Retail Coordinator
